name: Road To Death
descr: 关于这款游戏Road To Death is a first person shooter set in a dark demonic world. You have the choice to play a progressive Zombie mode, where you can earn points, barricade and unlock items and new levels. You can test your marksmanship in Training mode and bust out the big guns. Once you feel confident enough, press the button to call in the terrorists! If you get tired slaying zombies and terrorists, you can kick back and relax at the Safehouse and watch the news while listening to some tunes.
detail:
名称: Road To Death
类型: 动作, 冒险, 独立
开发商: Big Bird Games
发行商: Big Bird Games
发行日期: 2020 年 5 月 19 日
review: 全部评测: 5 篇用户评测 - 需要更多用户评测来生成整体评价
全部评测: 5 篇用户评测 () 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7 or higher
处理器: i5-2500 3.30 GHz or better
内存: 6 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX or AMD Radeon Radeon R7 260X series card & above
存储空间: 需要 4 GB 可用空间
附注事项: Plays on most systems.
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
